entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow mixed with drizzle beginning in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
